content: साधारण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णा|णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Common (to two or more), joint; साधारणोऽयं प्रणयः <ls>Ś. 3</ls>; साधारणो भूषणभूष्यभावः <ls>Ku. 1. 42</ls>; <ls>R. 16. 5</ls>, <ls>V. 2. 16.</ls> {@--2@} Ordinary, common; साधारणी न खलु बाधा भवस्य <ls>Aśvad. 10.</ls> {@--3@} General, universal. {@--4@} Mingled, mixed with, in common with; उत्कंठासाधारणं परितोषमनुभवामि <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; वीज्यते स हि संसुप्तः श्वाससाधारणानिलैः <ls>Ku. 2. 42.</ls> {@--5@} Equal, similar, like. {@--6@} (In logic) Belonging to more than one instance alleged, one of the three divisions of the fallacy called अनैकांतिक q.v. --णं {@--1@} A common or general rule, a rule or precept generally applicable. {@--2@} A generic property.
साधारणी {@--1@} A twig of bamboo. {@--2@} A key.
